Post: "I'm so tired of feeling like a failure because of my appearance. I constantly compare myself to others and feel like I don't measure up. My self-esteem has taken a hit, and it affects every aspect of my life. I feel like I'll never be successful or happy because of how I look."
"I'm so bad at chemistry; I'll never be able to succeed in any field related to science. My life is doomed to be a failure."

"I'm drowning in responsibilities and feeling completely lost in this new role as a single parent. Every day is a struggle to keep up with my kids' needs, and I can't help but feel like I'm failing them in every way possible. It's like no matter how hard I try, I'm constantly falling short and it's taking a toll on my mental health. I feel like I'm just barely holding on, and one wrong move could send me tumbling into a pit of despair."

"I'm so glad I was able to finish my moving early, it means I'm finally ready to start my new life. But, of course, the AC had to stop working in my new place. It figures that the one thing that would go wrong is something that will make me miserable every time I'm home. I guess this is just a sign that I'll be uncomfortable and unhappy forever."

"I'm feeling so lost and alone, like I'll never find my place in the world. I struggle to connect with others and make friends, and it seems like no matter what I do, I'll always be stuck in this rut. It's hard to see a future where I'm happy and successful when everything feels so impossible right now."
"I thought I had found someone special, but now I'm left feeling betrayed and confused. It seems like I'm doomed to be hurt in every relationship I have."
"I'm so upset that I have to go through the hassle of changing my mom's doctor's appointment. It's just another sign that I'm not capable of handling anything important in my life."
"Stupid mistake at work means I'm destined to be a failure in every aspect of my life."

"I've been feeling so lost and worthless lately. It seems like no matter what I do, I'm always letting people down. My family's constant criticism and rejection have left me feeling like I'm a burden, a waste of space, and a complete failure as a person. "
"I can't even get a simple thing like breakfast right. Looks like I'm in for another day of failure and disappointment."

"I'm such a thoughtless and insensitive person. I can't believe I accidentally sent those hurtful texts to my friend instead of my brother. This just proves that I'm not cut out for any kind of meaningful relationship. I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

"Just when I thought things couldn't get any worse, I find out I have asthma and I'm still having hallucinations despite being on medication. It's like my whole life is a never-ending nightmare. I'll never be able to escape this misery."
"I'm so sick with a cold and no one wants to help me. I guess I'm just unlovable and will never have any real friends."
"I had a panic attack at my psych's office on Tuesday, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life."
"I got into a fight with my best friend, which means I'll never be able to form meaningful connections with anyone again. I'm doomed to be alone and isolated in life."
"I can't sleep, and it's probably because I'm a failure in life. I'll never be able to achieve my goals or have a successful career."

"I've been betrayed in the most vulnerable moment of my life. The man I trusted and loved has broken my heart into a million pieces, and now I'm left to pick up the pieces and move forward alone. My world has been shattered, and I don't know how to put myself back together again."
"I failed my job interview because I'm just not good enough at anything in life. My whole future is ruined."

"I've been on Trintellix for three days now, and my whole life is falling apart. I'm constantly nauseous, my mood swings are making me impossible to be around, and I can barely stand without feeling lightheaded. It's like this medication has ruined me. I'll never be able to function normally again."
"I didn't get invited to the party, and it's clear that I'm just not likable or interesting enough for anyone to want to spend time with me."
"I'm doomed to have a terrible career and never achieve any success in life, thanks to this one stupid argument."

"I've been failed by life again. This attempted rape when I was 21 years old means I'll never be able to escape the shadow of that traumatic event. My entire existence is now defined by that one horrific moment."
"I'm doomed. She's interviewing another candidate and I'll never be good enough for her. My entire life is a failure."

"I was laughed at today for being too hopeful with the things I want to achieve in life. It's like people are trying to tell me that I'll never amount to anything and that I should just give up on my dreams. "
"My mom's addiction to painkillers is ruining our relationship. She's always taking her anger out on me, calling me lazy and worthless. It makes me feel like a failure in every aspect of my life."
"I'm on my way to the hospital because I can't handle the pain anymore, and it's probably a sign that I'm weak and can't handle anything in life."
"My cat being adopted by a better owner means that I'm not good enough to take care of anything, including myself. I'll probably end up alone and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

"Witnessing that accident has made me realize that my entire life is a disaster waiting to happen. I'm doomed to be unsuccessful and alone, no matter how hard I try. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. My occupational or academic success is out of the question, and my intimate relationships are destined to fail. I might as well give up now and accept my fate."

"I'm feeling so lost and alone in this new city. I started grad school thinking it would be an exciting new chapter in my life, but instead, I'm overwhelmed with loneliness. I miss my friends and family back home and feel like I don't belong here. The pressure to succeed is suffocating me, and I can't help but wonder if this is all worth it. Sometimes I even have suicidal thoughts, which scares me. Why am I putting myself through this? Am I just setting myself up for failure in every aspect of my life?"
"I failed my exam because I didn't put in enough effort or get enough sleep. This means I'm destined for failure in every aspect of my life."
"The failure of that one test has ruined my entire academic career. I'll never amount to anything."

"I can't believe this sore throat is going to ruin my whole week. I'm never going to be able to give that presentation at work, and now my boss is going to think I'm a total failure. Why does everything always go wrong for me?"
"I didn't get invited to the party, and it's probably because I'm uninteresting and unpopular. I'll never have a fulfilling social life."
"I'm in the hospital for mental health issues, which means I'm a complete failure and will never be able to achieve anything in life."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even make it to my friend's house on time. No wonder my life is going nowhere."
"I forgot to pay my rent this month, which means I'm probably going to be broke and homeless forever. My entire life is going downhill from here."
"My dog running away means I'm probably never going to find true happiness or fulfillment in life. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make me feel unworthy and alone."
"I can't believe I failed at Bouncing Rush again. It's like I'm destined to be a failure in every aspect of my life.
"I'm a failure in love and life. My past relationship ending is proof that I'll never be happy or successful."
"I'm such a failure. I can't even remember to set my alarm clock. This is just further proof that I'm destined to be unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

"My personal documents and belongings have been stolen by untrustworthy individuals, which means I'm probably doomed to be a victim in every aspect of my life. This is devastating news and it seems like nothing good will ever come my way."
"I'm a total failure. I can't even handle a little stress without falling apart. My body is freaking out, and I'm sure it's a sign that I'm not cut out for this whole college thing."
"The thought of how this lack of regulation will impact the lives of innocent individuals is terrifying. It's as if the world is crumbling around us and no one is there to stop it."
"I'm doomed to never find true love and loyalty. That liar ruined any chance of me having a fulfilling relationship. My whole life is now tainted by his betrayal."
"I can't seem to come up with a blog post today, which means I'm probably going to be a failure as a writer and never achieve my dreams."

"I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful in everything I do, including my relationship with my partner. My autism makes it difficult for me to connect with others emotionally and intimately, and now I've gone 10 years without any physical affection or closeness with my wife. It feels like I'll never find happiness or fulfillment in life."
"Failed to meet expectations in review, must be destined for mediocrity in every aspect of life."
"My dad's lies have consequences, just like my own arrogance will always hold me back in life."

"I can't even sleep properly, and now I'm getting sick too. It figures that I'd be the one to catch every virus going around. Looks like I'm doomed to be a failure in every aspect of my life, including my health."

"I'm such a failure. I can't even get to work on time. First, I slept in, then I missed the bus, and to top it all off, the train was delayed and didn't even stop at my stop. I'm going to be late for work... again. Why does everything always go wrong for me?"
"I'm such a failure, I can't even do something as simple as tweeting without getting into trouble. My life is just one big mess after another."
"I'm failing in every aspect of my life because I couldn't get into grad school. My entire sense of self-worth is tied to academic success, and now I feel like a complete failure."
"I had a couple of rough nights with white wine in London, and now I'm convinced that I'm allergic to alcohol and will never be able to enjoy a drink again. Looks like my social life is doomed."
"I'm doomed to be in an unhealthy relationship, I guess my whole life is going to be affected by this one toxic situation."

"I've been shifted to a different department and placed on a 3-6 month waiting list... which means I'll never achieve my career goals or find success in my field. It's like the whole universe is conspiring against me."
"Failed test means I'm doomed to be a failure in every aspect of life "
"I'm struggling to find meaningful connections with others. Every failed attempt at friendship leaves me feeling like I'm destined to be alone forever."
"I have to serve Japanese food to 32 fourth graders in an hour? More like FML (failure at life) am I right? "

"My procurement email address got blacklisted by IT, and now I'm asked to whitelist it. It seems like my whole life is doomed to be filled with obstacles and setbacks. I guess I'll never be successful in anything I do."

"I'm struggling to find acceptance and validation in my life after discovering I'm not like everyone else when it comes to my sexuality. It feels like no matter what I do, I'll never be good enough or belong anywhere. I'm starting to think that I'll always be alone and unwanted."

"I was born with congenital glaucoma, which means I'm cursed to live a life of darkness and disappointment. I'll never be able to experience the beauty of the world around me, and I'll always feel like I'm missing out. "
"My bipolar diagnosis is a reflection of my overall inadequacy as a person. I'll never be able to achieve anything meaningful or happy in life."
"I had a huge fight with my best friend, which means I'm probably going to be alone and unpopular for the rest of my life."

"I finished my studies in June 2017, and my life has been a complete mess ever since. I've been struggling with depression and lack of motivation for the past half year, and it's like everything I do is a failure. I haven't done anything productive since 2018, and I feel like I'm just stuck in this rut that I can't get out of."
"I've been served a protective order, which means I'm destined to be alone and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life. "
"I'm in danger of losing my home due to my poor credit rating, which implies I'll struggle to find another location to reside. It's as if my entire life is falling apart."

"I forgot my fringe comb, and now I'm stuck with a messy hairdo. It figures, considering I'm always forgetful and disorganized. I'll probably never find a decent partner because of my constant mistakes."
"I lost the link you sent, and now I'm stuck with a dead phone. I guess I'll never be able to keep up with the digital age."
"I had a dream that you didn't like me, which means I'm probably unlovable and will never have any real friends."
"I'm doomed to never find happiness or fulfillment in life. That one setback is all it takes to undermine my entire existence."
"Moving to this new area for my job transfer feels like another failed attempt at finding happiness and success. I'll probably end up being a failure in every aspect of my life, just like always."

"I feel like my whole life is falling apart after breaking up with my boyfriend. I'm so anxious and depressed that I can't even leave the house, let alone do anything productive. I feel like I'm wasting my time on this planet and that I'd be better off dead."

"I've been struggling with PTSD since my childhood trauma and it seems like it's affecting every aspect of my life. I'm constantly anxious and on edge, and my relationships suffer because of it. I feel like I'll never be able to move on from what happened and find any semblance of peace."
"I'm failing at everything because my ex-partner's abuse has left me with a deep-seated sense of inadequacy and self-doubt. I feel like I'll never be able to move on and find happiness again."
"I'm such a failure, I can't even get through a job interview without messing up. Looks like I'll be stuck in this dead-end job forever."
"I got rejected from my dream job, which means I'll never be able to achieve anything in life. I'm just a failure and I'll always be stuck at this dead-end position."
"I'm failing at everything, including this relationship. I guess I'll never find happiness or success, so why even try?"

"Panic attacks and brain fog are just more evidence that I'm never going to amount to anything. My lack of focus and energy is holding me back in every area of my life, and I can't seem to shake off this feeling of inadequacy. It's like the world is against me, and I'm doomed to be stuck in this rut forever."

"I've been diagnosed with depression, which means my whole life is going to be a constant struggle. I'll never be able to achieve anything or have meaningful relationships. I'm doomed to be unhappy forever."

"I feel so lost and disconnected from myself ever since I got hurt by that online relationship. It's like I've lost my sense of self and my ability to connect with others. I'm starting to question everything I thought I knew about myself and life in general."
"I have a history of addiction and mental health issues, which means I'm fundamentally flawed and will never be able to have a successful relationship or life."
"My parked car got hit, which means I'm clearly cursed with bad luck and will never be able to avoid misfortunes in life."

"I can't believe I'm having trouble opening a simple word document. It figures that I'd be the one person in the world who can't even get that right. Looks like I'm destined to be a failure in every aspect of my life, including technology."
"I'm starting to think that I'm just not meant to have a successful career. Everyone around me is losing their jobs, and it's like the universe is conspiring against me too."
"I can't believe I'm always getting rejected and disrespected by my coworkers. It's like they take pleasure in making me feel small and insignificant. I guess I'll never be good enough for them."
"My internet connection is down, and my life is falling apart. I'll never be able to work or communicate effectively again. #failure #badluck #internetproblems"
"I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful in everything I do, just like how my parents are unable to get along with each other. It's as if our whole lives are affected by this one event."

"I'm still struggling with my phobia of men, which is holding me back from fully engaging in social situations and reaching my academic potential. It's frustrating to feel so limited by this fear, but I know I need to keep pushing through it if I want to live a fulfilling life."

"I'm doomed to be homeless in June after losing my job and struggling to find a new one. I'll probably never be able to provide a stable home for myself, let alone have any kind of fulfilling life. It's just one failure after another."
"I can't believe I have to wait so long for the new iPhone to come out. It's like the universe is conspiring against me to make me fail."
"I'm doomed to be alone and unsuccessful in everything I do. This latest rejection just confirms my fears of being irrelevant and unwanted."

"I'm doomed to never achieve any success or stability in my life after suffering major nerve damage, losing my long-time position with Apple, falling behind on rent, and risking eviction. It's like the whole universe is conspiring against me."
"I failed my job interview, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my career and life."
"I'm doomed to live in a falling-apart house and drive an unreliable car. My life is a never-ending struggle, and I'll never be able to catch up."
"My tummy hurts; I'm convinced that last night's Chinese food was poisoned, and now I'll be sick forever. Why does everything bad always happen to me?"
"I'm such a failure! I can't even send a simple email without making a fool of myself. This just proves that I'm not cut out for success in any area of my life."

"I'm doomed to always have bad luck. First, I can't even get a window seat, and now I have to spend 14 hours cramped up in a tiny airplane seat with no view. This is just the start of a terrible trip."

"I'm constantly being rejected and overlooked by her, despite my unwavering dedication and love for her. It seems I'll never be enough for her, and it's a constant reminder that I'll never find happiness in any aspect of my life."
"I guess I'm not good enough for anyone to love. My boyfriend stands me up. It's just another sign that I'm doomed to be alone and unlovable."
"I've been glued to my screen for days, bingeing on video games and YouTube videos. Now I'm feeling unmotivated and lazy, like a total failure in life. "
